testcase.name: Test 2 to Test 5: - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: When I have registered a new station to OpenWhetherMap with values of "DEMO_TEST001","Team Demo Test Station 001","33.33","-122.43","222".passed Then I have received HTTP response code of "201"............................passed Then I see my new station with values of "DEMO_TEST001","Team Demo Test Station 001","33.33","-122.43","222".passed When I delete my latest station associated with my APIKey in OpenWhetherMap.passed Then I have received HTTP response code of "204"............................passed Then I have received HTTP response code of "404"............................passed And I should see the message body with "message" as "Station not found".....passed
